english.segment1: Is this another complication I face?. Here is the mistake coming back to catch me. To you, to You I hold
english.segment2: Now I know that I'm alive. All the loneliness is filled by you inside. And as I finally breathe the air. You open up my eyes and now I'm alive
english.segment3: The lesson in breathing, is never using control. Seconds to misplaced I've never been so unsure. To you, to You I hold
english.segment4: Now I know that I'm alive. All the loneliness is filled by you inside. And as I finally breathe the air. You open up my eyes and now I'm alive
english.segment5: To the heights, to the heights, there is hope. It's been waiting all along. To the heights, to the heights, there is hope. Waiting.
english.segment6: Now I know that I'm alive. All the loneliness is filled by you inside. And as I finally breathe the air. You open up my eyes and now I'm alive.
